title: Targeting to avoid 30 mn tonnes of GHG emissions by 2030, says Dhanpal Jhaveri, Eversource CEO
description: Eversource Capital planned significant investments to support India's net zero transition, targeting a reduction of 30 million tonnes of emissions by 2030. Its portfolio spans renewable energy, waste management, and e-mobility, impacting millions. The initiative attracted funds from U.S. and Danish institutions to bolster climate-friendly businesses.
